sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CITBMCIF ( MCIF_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, MCIF_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) NOT NULL, MCIF_APPL_DATE CHAR(8) NOT NULL, MCIF_ATMO_GUBN CHAR(1) NOT NULL, MCIF_COME_CODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, MCIF_MCHH_CODE VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, MCIF_SORT_NUMB NUMBER(10), MCIF_SHIF_CODE VARCHAR(8), MCIF_MCHH_NAME VARCHAR(120), MCIF_DRCT_GUBN CHAR(1), MCIF_DRCT_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_NEGO_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_MCRP_MCPR NUMBER(16,6), MCIF_MCRP_RPYR NUMBER(5,2), MCIF_RUN0_DAYS NUMBER(7,2), MCIF_RUN0_TIME NUMBER(7,2), MCIF_MCRP_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_BDRP_RFAR NUMBER(7,2), MCIF_BDRP_APRT NUMBER(5,2), MCIF_BDRP_BDCT NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_BDRP_AVYR NUMBER(5,2), MCIF_BDRP_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_REPR_TIME NUMBER(2), MCIF_REPR_RATE NUMBER(5,2), MCIF_REPR_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_ELPR_CAPA NUMBER(7,2), MCIF_ELPR_EXRT NUMBER(5,2), MCIF_ELPR_ELPR NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_ELPR_COST NUMBER(14,6), MCIF_MCHH_CNT0 NUMBER(5), MCIF_PROC_GUBN VARCHAR(10), MCIF_MCHH_LNCD VARCHAR(20), MCIF_REMK_0001 VARCHAR(200), MCIF_APPL_YN CHAR(1), MCIF_DELT_YN CHAR(1), MCIF_APPL_VALU1 NUMBER(20,6), MCIF_APPL_VALU2 NUMBER(20,6), MCIF_APPL_VALU3 NUMBER(20,6), MCIF_APPL_GRP1 VARCHAR(8), MCIF_APPL_GRP2 VARCHAR(8), MCIF_APPL_GRP3 VARCHAR(8), MCIF_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), MCIF_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), MCIF_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), MCIF_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) )

WITH T1 ( MCIF_CORP_CODE ,MCIF_STND_GUBN ,MCIF_APPL_DATE ,MCIF_ATMO_GUBN ,MCIF_COME_CODE ,MCIF_MCHH_CODE ,MCIF_SORT_NUMB ,MCIF_SHIF_CODE ,MCIF_MCHH_NAME ,MCIF_DRCT_GUBN ,MCIF_DRCT_COST ,MCIF_NEGO_COST ,MCIF_MCRP_MCPR ,MCIF_MCRP_RPYR ,MCIF_RUN0_DAYS ,MCIF_RUN0_TIME ,MCIF_MCRP_COST ,MCIF_BDRP_RFAR ,MCIF_BDRP_APRT ,MCIF_BDRP_BDCT ,MCIF_BDRP_AVYR ,MCIF_BDRP_COST ,MCIF_REPR_TIME ,MCIF_REPR_RATE ,MCIF_REPR_COST ,MCIF_ELPR_CAPA ,MCIF_ELPR_EXRT ,MCIF_ELPR_ELPR ,MCIF_ELPR_COST ,MCIF_MCHH_CNT0 ,MCIF_PROC_GUBN ,MCIF_MCHH_LNCD ,MCIF_REMK_0001 ,MCIF_APPL_YN ,MCIF_DELT_YN ,MCIF_APPL_VALU1 ,MCIF_APPL_VALU2 ,MCIF_APPL_VALU3 ,MCIF_APPL_GRP1 ,MCIF_APPL_GRP2 ,MCIF_APPL_GRP3 ,MCIF_UPDT_DATE ,MCIF_UPDT_CMAN ,MCIF_INIT_DATE ,MCIF_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1','H','20200331','A','HOSE','PRETREAT-LINE',42,'20','전처리 LINE','A',126933,0,0,10,260,20,0,0,3.5,440000,40,0,20,12,0,0,0,118,0,NULL,'SUM',NULL,'RUBBER의 전처리 LINE','Y','N',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20200330','SYSTEM30','20200330','SYSTEM30' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1','H','20220801','A','HOSE','PRETREAT-LINE',42,'20','전처리 LINE','A',125687,0,0,10,260,20,0,0,3.5,440000,40,0,20,12,0,0,0,118,0,NULL,'SUM',NULL,'RUBBER의 전처리 LINE','Y','N',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20221001','SYSTEM22','20221001','SYSTEM22' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1','H','20240215','A','HOSE','PRETREAT-LINE',42,'20','전처리 LINE','D',138846,0,0,10,260,20,0,0,3.5,440000,40,0,20,12,0,0,0,173,0,NULL,'SUM',NULL,'RUBBER의 전처리 LINE과 동일장비임 - 삭제주의','Y','N',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,'20240215','SYSTEM24','20240215','SYSTEM24' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MCIF_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMCIF B ON B.MCIF_CORP_CODE = A.MCIF_CORP_CODE AND B.MCIF_STND_GUBN = A.MCIF_STND_GUBN AND B.MCIF_APPL_DATE = A.MCIF_APPL_DATE AND B.MCIF_ATMO_GUBN = A.MCIF_ATMO_GUBN AND B.MCIF_COME_CODE = A.MCIF_COME_CODE AND B.MCIF_MCHH_CODE = A.MCIF_MCHH_CODE
